subgroup.sentence: Charles Dickens is all of the following: a thing, a person and a man, and so on (5 items).
Charles Dickens is author of David Copperfield.
Charles Dickens is resident in England.
David Copperfield is written by Charles Dickens.
David Copperfield is all of the following: a thing, a novel, and a book.
Charles Dickens is author of David Copperfield.
David Copperfield is written by Charles Dickens.
England is all of the following: a thing, a place, and a country.
Jane Austen and Charles Dickens are residents in England.
An englishman is defined as a man that is resident in England.
An englishman is both a person, and a man.
Charles Dickens is an englishman.
An englishwoman is defined as a woman that is resident in England.
An englishwoman is both a woman, and a person.
Jane Austen is an englishwoman.
Jane Austen is all of the following: a thing, a woman and a person, and so on (5 items).
Jane Austen is author of the Pride and Prejudice.
Jane Austen is resident in England.
The Pride and Prejudice is written by Jane Austen.
Leo Tolstoy is all of the following: a thing, a person and a man, and so on (5 items).
Leo Tolstoy is author of the War and Peace.
Leo Tolstoy is resident in Russia.
The War and Peace is written by Leo Tolstoy.
The Pride and Prejudice is all of the following: a thing, a novel, and a book.
Jane Austen is author of the Pride and Prejudice.
The Pride and Prejudice is written by Jane Austen.
Russia is all of the following: a thing, a place, and a country.
Leo Tolstoy is resident in Russia.
A russian is defined as a person that is resident in Russia.
A russian is a person.
Leo Tolstoy is a russian.
The War and Peace is all of the following: a thing, a novel, and a book.
Leo Tolstoy is author of the War and Peace.
The War and Peace is written by Leo Tolstoy.
An author is defined as a person that is author of a book.
An author is a person.
The following are authors: Leo Tolstoy, Jane Austen and Charles Dickens.
X is written by Y if and only if Y is author of X.
Charles Dickens is author of David Copperfield.
Jane Austen is author of the Pride and Prejudice.
Leo Tolstoy is author of the War and Peace.
A book is a thing.
If X is written by Y then X is a book.
The following are books: the War and Peace, the Pride and Prejudice and David Copperfield.
A novel is a book.
A country is a place.
If X is region of Y then Y is a country.
Russia and England are countries.
A man is a person.
Leo Tolstoy and Charles Dickens are men.
An englishman is a man.
A novel is a book.
The following are novels: the War and Peace, the Pride and Prejudice and David Copperfield.
A person is a thing.
If X is written by Y then Y is a person.
If X is resident in Y then X is a person.
The following are people: women, men and authors, and so on (6 items).
The following are people: Leo Tolstoy, Jane Austen and Charles Dickens.
A place is a thing.
If X is resident in Y then Y is a place.
Russia and England are places.
A country is a place.
If X is region of Y then Y is a country.
If X is resident in Y then Y is a place.
If X is resident in Y then X is a person.
Leo Tolstoy is resident in Russia.
Jane Austen and Charles Dickens are residents in England.
A woman is a person.
An englishwoman is a woman.
Jane Austen is a woman.
If X is written by Y then Y is a person.
If X is written by Y then X is a book.
X is written by Y if and only if Y is author of X.
David Copperfield is written by Charles Dickens.
The Pride and Prejudice is written by Jane Austen.
The War and Peace is written by Leo Tolstoy.
The following are things: the War and Peace, Russia and the Pride and Prejudice, and so on (8 items).
The following are things: places, people, and books.
